alert.note: Alert for Blue Earth; Brown; Nicollet (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 21 at 8:49PM CDT until May 28 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Minnesota River at Savage affecting Dakota, Carver, Scott and Hennepin Counties. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Minnesota... Rum River near St. Francis affecting Anoka County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Minnesota River At New Ulm affecting Brown, Blue Earth and Nicollet Counties. Minnesota River At Morton affecting Redwood and Renville Counties. Minnesota River at Montevideo affecting Lac qui Parle, Chippewa and Yellow Medicine Counties. Minnesota River near Jordan affecting Carver, Scott and Sibley Counties. Sauk River at St. Cloud affecting Stearns County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Minnesota River At New Ulm. * WHEN...Until Saturday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 745 PM CDT Saturday, the stage was 801.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 745 PM CDT Saturday was 801.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 801.6 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 800.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 799.8 feet on 10/09/2017. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
